name: Cold and Alone (Snapplers)
description:
Made for the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1 in about 6 days. In this game you must figure out how to survive on a small island through a cold night in order to be rescued. You must keep your temperature above 0, which is shown in the bottom left of the screen.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Pick up sticks: E

Throw sticks: Q

Switch items (when you get them): 1/2

Use item: left mouse
